description: * Ever watch the hit T.V. Show “Deal or No Deal”? Now, there’s Deal or No Deal the game. * Now Deal Or No Deal is available in Palm. * Start picking your box, select six of out of 25 boxes to reveal, one at a time. * You will get a "Banker phone call", who makes an offer to buy the player box for a certain amount, based on the cash amounts still in play. * If you want to accept the banker offer, then your game ends, and the contents of his/her case are revealed . Should you refuse the offer, you then must choose five of the remaining boxes to eliminate from consideration. * Another deal with the Banker is made, and play continues as before. * Play this game and test your luck. * Definitely you feel the excitement and tension while opening briefcases and decide on the banker's offers. * Enjoy playing with this game.
